    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AudioManager
    Manages all audio playback within the application, including background music and sound effects.
    Board
    Represents the game board, defining the contract for all game board implementations.
    Brick
    Represents a Tetris brick, defining the common behavior for all brick types.
    BrickGenerationStrategy
    Defines the contract for brick generation strategies.
    BrickGenerator
    Defines the contract for brick generation logic.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation of a Tetris brick.
    BrickType
    Represents the different types of Tetris bricks.
    BrickViewManager
    Manages the display and position of the active brick and its ghost.
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of clearing rows on the game board, including the number of lines removed, the new board matrix, any score bonus, and the indices of the cleared rows.
    Command
    The Command interface for encapsulating game actions.
    Constants
    Utility class containing various constants used throughout the game, including board dimensions, UI rendering parameters, and gameplay mechanics.
    ControlsController
    Controller for the controls settings view.
    DefaultMediaPlayerFactory
    Default implementation of the MediaPlayerFactory interface.
    DownData
    Represents the data returned after a brick moves down, including information about any cleared rows and the updated view data.
    EventSource
    Defines the source of a game event, either from user input or an automated thread.
    EventType
    Defines the types of movement events that can occur in the game.
    GameController
    Handles game logic and acts as an intermediary between the GUI and the game board.
    GameOverPanel
    A simple JavaFX BorderPane that displays a "GAME OVER" message.
    GuiController
    Controller for the main game GUI, handling user input, game display, and interactions.
    HardDropCommand
    Command to perform a hard drop action in the game.
    IBrick
    Represents the 'I' shaped Tetris brick.
    InputEventListener
    Defines the contract for an event listener that handles various game input events.
    JBrick
    Represents the 'J' shaped Tetris brick.
    LBrick
    Represents the 'L' shaped Tetris brick.
    LeaderboardController
    Controller for the leaderboard view.
    LeaderboardManager
    Manages the game's leaderboard, including saving, loading, and sorting scores.
    LeaderboardManager.LeaderboardEntry
    Represents a single entry in the leaderboard, containing player name, score, level, rows cleared, and a timestamp.
    Main
    The main entry point for the Tetris JFX application.
    MainMenu
    Controller for the main menu of the Tetris JFX application.
    MatrixOperations
    Provides static utility methods for performing operations on 2D integer matrices, primarily used for game board and brick manipulations in Tetris.
    MediaPlayerFactory
    An interface for a factory that creates JavaFX Media and MediaPlayer objects.
    MoveDownCommand
    Command to move the current brick down one step.
    MoveEvent
    Represents a movement event in the game, encapsulating the type of event and its source (user input or automated process).
    MoveLeftCommand
    Command to move the current brick left one step.
    MoveRightCommand
    Command to move the current brick right one step.
    NextShapeInfo
    A data class representing information about the next shape in a brick's rotation sequence.
    NotificationPanel
    A custom JavaFX BorderPane that displays notifications, typically for scores or bonus messages, with animated fade and translate transitions.
    OBrick
    Represents the 'O' shaped Tetris brick.
    PreviewPanelManager
    Manages the display of next brick previews and the held brick in the UI.
    RandomBrickGenerationStrategy
    A brick generation strategy that uses a "bag" of bricks to ensure a random but fair distribution.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    A brick generator that uses a strategy to create new bricks.
    RotateClockwiseCommand
    Command to rotate the current brick clockwise.
    RotateCounterClockwiseCommand
    Command to rotate the current brick counter-clockwise.
    SBrick
    Represents the 'S' shaped Tetris brick.
    Score
    Manages the player's score, level, and rows cleared in the game.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings view, managing audio settings (volume, mute) and navigation to controls.
    SimpleBoard
    A simple implementation of the game board.
    SlowBrick
    Represents the 'Slow' special brick.
    TBrick
    Represents the 'T' shaped Tetris brick.
    TileStyleUtility
    Utility class for applying CSS styles to Rectangle objects representing game tiles.
    ViewData
    A data class that encapsulates all information required by the view layer to render the game state.
    ZBrick
    Represents the 'Z' shaped Tetris brick.
